summary: The bill, titled the Standardizing Treatment and Referral Times Act of 2025 (START Act), aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code concerning veterans' healthcare. It focuses on establishing the validity period for referrals made by VA health care providers to non-Department providers for veterans seeking care under the Community Care Program. Specifically, the valid referral period begins on the day the veteran has their first appointment with the outside provider.
